posts.raw_content:
What the communists have done...

1.) The communists started this many years ago, shot Trump, now Kirk (and countless others)
2.) The wanton violence on the streets targeting innocent civilians.
3.) The communists supporting of criminals and gangs.
4.) The communists outright stealing/rigging of many elections.
5.) And my personal favorite, the Covid Tyranny and forced vaccination
6.) The public vilification of Trump and his supporters and the incarceration of him and his strongest allies
7.) The outright use of government to go after media personalities favorable to the right (Tucker, Steven Crowder, Alex Jones, Tim Pool and many others).

And much more...

What we must do....

1.) The Trump administration has to act.  This include incarcerations of the communists in the media inciting violence, watch lists of the Tranny's threatening violence and significant charges against the past administrations leaders that led us to this point.  State governors that do not go along must be treated as secessionists and either incarcerated or their leadership ended with full military control of the state until some future point in time.

2.) If they fail to act or option one is weakly executed, the conservatives of this country need to be prepared to decimate the left (reduction of 10% of the left as rapidly as possible)

posts.raw_content:
A source in contact with Kirk’s colleagues told the Daily Caller he is still alive and currently in the hospital. He lost a lot of blood. A suspect is in custody, according to Deseret News.
“This is an ongoing situation,” Turning Point USA wrote in a statement to the Daily Caller. “We are in the process of confirming reports that Charlie Kirk was shot. He is in the hospital, and we are praying for him at this time.”

FBI Director Kash Patel said the agency is “closely monitoring reports of the tragic shooting” and that “agents will be on the scene quickly and the FBI stands in full support of the ongoing response and investigation.” Attorney General Pam Bondi said the FBI and Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms (ATF) is on the scene.

He is in the hospital, and we are praying for him at this time.”
